channel.title: Ps on A blog by Yosua Ian Sebastian
channel.description: Recent content in Ps on A blog by Yosua Ian Sebastian

item.title: Can - Will - Did
item.description: I can do it. Actually, I will do it. Finally, I did it!

item.title: Focusing Is Hard For Current Me
item.description: These days, I can not focus on one thing for extended amount of time.

item.title: Monitor Notes
item.description: A diary of boring adventure in setting up monitors. Also works as a timecapsule letter, dear future me, don’t repeat these mistakes.

item.title: Device List
item.description: List of devices that I use, mainly to make sure I don’t forget that I (used to) own these things.

item.title: Buyee or Geek Jack?
item.description: My personal experiences from buying VTuber goods through Buyee and Geek Jack.

item.title: Where's My index.html?
item.description: How I learned about git submodules behavior when trying to deploy this site.
